name: Metal Ball Fall Down Extreme
description:
How long can you keep the metal ball on the screen?
Metal Ball Fall Down Extreme is a free game for test your brain and reflexes.Tilt smart phone to control the ball direction fall through the holes and avoid getting squished at the top.The game will speed up making it more difficult to avoid obstacles.Your reflexes will be tested to the limit .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Tilt smart phone to control the ball direction fall through the holes and avoid getting squished at the top .

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- 3d platform game
- Simple and fast game play
- Realistic steel box and metal ball
